### Answer 1 - Sieve

```{python}
#| cache: true

import time

def sieve(n: float) -> list:
  x = list(range(2, int(n)+1))
  p = []
  while len(x) > 0:
    p.append(x[0])
    # incremental elimination
    x = [i for i in x if i % x[0] != 0]
  return(p)

t0 = time.perf_counter()
x = sieve(2e6)
print(sum(x))
t1 = time.perf_counter()
t = t1 - t0
print(f'{t:.3f} sec elapsed')
```
